Objects.Name: fur strap piece hide
Objects.Description: A long strip of hide is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A long piece of hide covered in brown fur looks like it could be worn.

Objects.Name: white toga
Objects.Description: A large white piece of cloth is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The white cloth looks large enough to wrap completely around a giant.

Objects.Name: leather sandal
Objects.Description: A wellcrafted pair of leather sandals set here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Made from the finest of leather these sandals look very comfortable.

Objects.Name: gold medallion chain
Objects.Description: A golden chain is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This large medallion has been created from pure gold.  On the front severallarge gems have been set.  On the back a strange symbol familiar to the onesoutside.

Objects.Name: ring diamond
Objects.Description: A diamond ring is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This thick gold band contains an huge diamond.  The diamond has been cutinto a perfect circle.

Objects.Name: golden armband
Objects.Description: A golden armband is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The golden armband is unusually cold.

Objects.Name: wand stick
Objects.Description: A long stick is lying here twitching.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The small stick is slightly twisted and looks freshly cut.

Objects.Name: banana
Objects.Description: A yellow banana is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The banana is bright yellow, it appears to have been just picked.

Objects.Name: mango
Objects.Description: A ripe mango is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The mango looks plump and juicy.

Objects.Name: coconut milk
Objects.Description: A coconut of milk is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The top of the coconut has been cut off making it look like a cup of milk.

Objects.Name: pineapple
Objects.Description: A pineapple is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The pineapple has been cut and cleaned so that it is now easy to eat.

Objects.Name: sword blade
Objects.Description: A large sword from a Zamba warrior is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This Zamba sword has a long think blade.  The end of the hilt has beenshaped into the image of a panther.

Objects.Name: plate fish
Objects.Description: A plate of fish is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The wooden plate is full of fish and bread.

Objects.Name: short table
Objects.Description: A short table rests in the center of the room.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The short table is covered with food and dishes.  Some of the food is freshbut other things are moldy and stink really bad.  A wooden plate of fish andbread looks fresh and tasty.

Objects.Name: doll toy
Objects.Description: A toy doll is lying here abandoned on the floor.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The toy doll is made of a brown cloth with a green dress.  Extra stitcheswhere done to make the dolls face.

Objects.Name: shelf
Objects.Description: A tall shelf sets against the east wall.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The shelf is made of many branches tied together that have been shaped andsmoothed so that it was sturdy and level.  It has been decorated with many oddthings.  One part of the shelf has a sliding door.

Objects.Name: statue clay
Objects.Description: A small statue made of clay is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The small statue is of a person with the head of a cat.  It is slightlysmaller than a helmet and made of red clay.  It almost looks alive from thesuperb quality and realistic workmanship of the artist.  Small rubys have beenset for its eyes and golden claws extend from the hands.

Objects.Name: cog shell
Objects.Description: A large cog shell is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The large cog shell is rough on the outside and bright white.  On the insideit is smooth and pink.  As you move it around in your hand the inside seems toglitter and change slightly.

Objects.Name: red candle
Objects.Description: A red candle is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Dark red wax forms this fat slightly used candle.  At the base of the candleis a holder made of glass to catch the wax as it drips.

Objects.Name: tea drink glass island madness cup tea
Objects.Description: A glass of Island Madness has been left here.

Objects.Name: wind drink glass spirit wine
Objects.Description: A glass of spirits has been left here.

Objects.Name: firebreather coconut cup firebreather
Objects.Description: A cup made from a coconut has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Inside the coconut cup is a drink called island madness.

Objects.Name: tail whip iguana
Objects.Description: A green tail is lying here twitching.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The green tail from an iquana is quite long and looks like it would make anexcellent whip.

Objects.Name: feather anklet
Objects.Description: A feather anklet is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Several colorful feathers have been joined together with a thick band ofgold.

Objects.Name: shark tooth necklace
Objects.Description: A shark tooth necklace is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This necklace is fashioned from the teeth of a large shark tied togetherwith a leather strap.

Objects.Name: basket
Objects.Description: An empty basket is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This basket has been woven together by hand and can be carried in severalways.

Objects.Name: bow
Objects.Description: A small bow and arrow is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This small bow and arrow was crafted for young boys to train with.  It islight weight and easy to handle.

Objects.Name: metal box
Objects.Description: A metal box rests on the floor.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This metal box is made of fine silver but very tarnished with years of age.The lock is shattered and is useless.  Its the size of a small personal chest.

Objects.Name: book journal
Objects.Description: A heavy book is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The large book is quite heavy and made of leather.  On the front theembossed letters are too faded to read.  But a bookmark page at the end of thebook looks readable.

Objects.Name: black robe
Objects.Description: A black robe is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This black cloak is quite light for how thick it is.  Its wide hood drapesover your face.  The collar is drawn closed with a gold medallion of a blackpanthers head.  The cloak is made from a rough leather.

Objects.Name: petal shield yellow
Objects.Description: A yellow petal from the Zamba hook plant is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The shield is one of the petals of the Zamba Hook plant.  It is brightyellow and does not appear to be wilting or turning.  It is easy to hold, lightand strudy.

Objects.Name: pearl hair comb
Objects.Description: A pearl hair comb is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This wellcrafted hair comb is a combination of gold and pearls formed into alarge butterfly.

Objects.Name: ring
Objects.Description: A golden ring is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This golden ring is engraved with the seal of Empiress Kiona.

Objects.Name: ruby bracer
Objects.Description: A ruby bracer is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This wide bracer is made of quality gold and has a oval rudy set in thecenter.

Objects.Name: emerald bracer
Objects.Description: An emerald bracer is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This wide bracer is made of quality gold and has a large emerald set in thecenter.

Objects.Name: skull helmet
Objects.Description: A skull helmet is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The skull appears to be from a large reptile.  It has been cleaned andfashioned into a fine helmet.

Objects.Name: black powder vial
Objects.Description: A vial of black powder is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The clear container is full of a potion created from black powder that oozeswithin the vial.

Objects.Name: torch
Objects.Description: A small torch is mounted to the wall.

Objects.Name: breastplate bone
Objects.Description: A bone breastplate made of human bones is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This breastplate has been created with a mixture of human bones and animalteeth fused together with Titanium.

Objects.Name: skeleton bone
Objects.Description: The skeleton remains of a human lie here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The skeleton is setting in an upright position as if it just sat down torest.  It is the remains of a man dress in leather and armor, his equipment isvery rusty and dented.  A broken sword hilt is still held in his right hand.

Objects.Name: wooden cabinet
Objects.Description: A oak cabinet sets against the east wall.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The oak cabinet has several doors and fills the space of the east wall.The top of the cabinet holds an engraved message which reads, "Please feel freeto get comfortable.  You must remove your armor and weapons here.  "

Objects.Name: monocle glass eyewear
Objects.Description: A monocle is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The small monocle is made of a fine, clear glass with gold trim.  Itsdesigned to be worn on one eye and has a gold chain attached to clip to a sidepocket.

Objects.Name: fountain ice sculpture
Objects.Description: A fountain sets in the center of the room.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The fountain is made of white marble.  Inside the center of the fountain anice sculpture of a mermaid holding a vessel pouring cool water into thefountain.  The sculpture is cold and does not melt despite the warmth of theroom.

Objects.Name: wheel cheese
Objects.Description: A wheel of cheese is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The heavy wheel of cheese is covered with a thick cloth.  The cheese is darkyellow and looks tasty.

Objects.Name: wine barrel wine
Objects.Description: A barrel of wine sets here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The barrel is large with the word wine wrote on top and a royal crestengraved in its side.

Objects.Name: blood decanter blood
Objects.Description: A tiny decanter is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This tiny decanter contains a red liquid.

Objects.Name: silver boots
Objects.Description: A set of silver boots is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The silver boots have been polished to a fine shine.  Engraved on theoutside of each boot is the image of a snarling panther.

Objects.Name: key collar
Objects.Description: A large pet collar is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A key dangles from the panthers collar.

Objects.Name: pewter wristband
Objects.Description: A pewter wristband is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This wide piece of pewter has been shaped to wear around your wrist andlined with a soft piece of fur.

Objects.Name: seashell necklace
Objects.Description: A necklace adorned with seashells is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A beautiful seashell as been attached to a braided piece of leather.

Objects.Name: torch
Objects.Description: A wooden torch is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The torch is a thick piece of wood with a moist cloth wrapped around the topend.

Objects.Name: leather bag
Objects.Description: A leather bag is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The leather bag is quite large.

Objects.Name: scroll
Objects.Description: An old scroll is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: You see a rolled up piece of paper faded and yellow from age.  The top ofthe parchment reads return home.
